duties_responsibilities.duty: Capture professional-grade 4K 10 Bit Footage and still images using own camera gear.
Utilize drone for aerial photography and capture breathtaking aerial shots and footage.
Efficiently manage time and schedules to meet project deadlines and expectations.
Coordinate with clients and team members to determine shooting locations and logistics.
Edit and post-process videos to create visually compelling and engaging content.
Enhance and retouch photos to ensure they meet professional standards.
Ensure camera gear and drone are well-maintained and in working condition.
Drive to various shooting locations within the Sacramento area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Videography, Photography, or a related field
